title: Finding the medium where you're most comfortable
output:
1) Part was a super nice guy, but there is a certain type of person who is better to talk to online. This person has better online social skills than in-person social skills.

2) Darmesh is one of these people. He prefers to communicate through writing rather than speaking in person.

3) Darmesh has spent months optimizing his laugh per minute (LPM), and even built a python script to help him do so.

4) Quinn is another fierce nerd at HubSpot. He once programmed a robotic arm to beat his girlfriend at a word scramble game.

5) Darmesh owns cambridge.com and other domains, and is considering building a community for venn diagrams.

title: Five random domains that Shaan owns
output:
1. Excel Monkeys: a domain for buying smart monkeys that can use excel, or a tax service that specializes in excel templates.

2. Skillbad: A website that helps people improve at a skill they are bad at.

3. Tummy time: A website or service that helps babies develop their core strength and neck strength.

4. The acapella people: A group of people who enjoy singing together, often in an informal setting like at weddings or parties.
